name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a technologically adept Full Stack Developer with 8 years of experience, I excel in delivering high-performance solutions, showcasing technical expertise in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. My background includes extensive skills in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, with proven experience managing cloud services on **Azure** and **AWS**. I have successfully engineered enterprise-grade platforms that incorporate AI/ML functionalities for predictive analytics and real-time data processing.

My strong problem-solving skills enhance my proficiency in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, ensuring I develop robust and compliant applications adhering to standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Furthermore, I possess hands-on experience in building machine learning pipelines, serving ML models in production, and executing MLOps workflows with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. I am flexible and deliver projects effectively while maintaining clear communication with stakeholders.

experience.responsibilities:

- Collaborated effectively through **communication skills** with data scientists to integrate NLP models using **spaCy** and **Hugging Face Transformers** for document parsing and anomaly detection, embedding them into core services via RESTful APIs.

Utilized **technical expertise** to lead the development and modernization of financial platforms by adopting a microservices-based architecture using **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, boosting scalability, maintainability, and throughput for high-volume transaction systems.
Exhibited strong **problem-solving skills** by building dynamic, user-focused front-end applications using **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, applying **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create responsive and performant user interfaces for financial dashboards and admin portals.
Leveraged **communication skills** to develop real-time transaction monitoring and analytics dashboards using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling operations teams to track financial activity, detect anomalies, and generate actionable insights.
Demonstrated **flexibility** by integrating **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to establish a robust event-driven architecture, supporting asynchronous communication and real-time event processing for transactions, alerts, and compliance workflows.
Displayed **technical expertise** in building and orchestrating ETL pipelines using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, enabling batch and real-time ingestion of financial data from internal and third-party sources.
Implemented AI/ML-powered fraud detection systems using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning** to analyze transaction patterns and user behavior, proactively flagging suspicious activities in banking systems.
Created ML pipelines for credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, integrating model inference directly into backend services for real-time decision-making.

• Demonstrated technical expertise in designing and optimizing backend services for a global e-commerce platform using **Python** (**FastAPI**, **Django**) and **Node.js** (**NestJS**, **Express**), achieving high availability and low latency across key modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
• Utilized problem-solving skills to engineer real-time features with **WebSockets** and event-driven architecture powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, resulting in dynamic order updates and improved customer support.
• Adapted frontend development strategies using **React 18**, **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, enhanced with **TypeScript**, **Redux Toolkit**, and **Tailwind CSS**, delivering fast, responsive user experiences on both web and mobile platforms.
• Applied flexibility in leveraging **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra** for distributed data storage, ensuring fault-tolerant access for high-traffic e-commerce workflows (up to **10,000** concurrent users) and caching frequently accessed resources.
• Integrated AI/ML-based recommendation engines using **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow** to personalize product listings and improve conversion rates by up to **30%** based on real-time behavioral data.
• Implemented **Redis** caching for product metadata, shopping cart sessions, and search results, significantly improving application responsiveness by reducing read pressure on databases.
• Executed effective communication skills through implementing feature flags and blue-green deployments using **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes** namespaces, enabling controlled rollouts and risk mitigation during updates.
• Crafted responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs using **Next.js**, **Vue 3 + Nuxt**, and **HTML5/CSS3**, optimized for mobile-first engagement and compliance with accessibility standards (WCAG **2.1**).
